Key Match Events: The Philadelphia Phillies defeated the Atlanta Braves 5-4 in a series opener.
Matt Olson hit two home runs for the Braves.
Brandon Marsh hit a three-run homer for the Phillies.
Nick Castellanos hit a decisive two-run homer for the Phillies.
Post-Match Reflections: Braves manager Brian Snitker reflected on the loss and his decision to leave Charlie Morton in the game.
Grant Holmes discussed the learning process and his pitch selection to Nick Castellanos.
Matt Olson commented on the game, noting the impact of two big swings.
